title: GameCube
summary: The Nintendo GameCube[lower-alpha 2][lower-alpha 3] is a home video game console released by Nintendo in Japan on September 14, 2001, in North America on November 18, 2001, and in PAL territories in 2002. The GameCube was Nintendo's entry in the sixth generation of video game consoles and is the successor to the Nintendo 64. The GameCube competed with Sony's PlayStation 2 and Microsoft's original Xbox.
